name: Pet vs Monster
description:
I love Strategy Games.

I like Plant Vs Zombies.

So i make a strategy game with Plant vs Zombies concept!
BUT... This is different, So we defend ourself with Pet from Monster that attack our base, but in this game you can evolve the pet to make it more Powerful!
To Evolve the pet you must feed the pet until its reached max amount
every pet have weakness and power, good luck with that!

i even make a challenging level called Strategist 1, 2 and 3 to make it More Fun!
I hope you enjoy my game :D , and Thanks For Playing!
Its still prototype tho and still have a chance to continue develop it
